articles.title: EVOS Esports Collaborates with PUMA – European Gaming Industry News - European Gaming Industry News
articles.description: EVOS Esports, the leading esports organization in Southeast Asia, has announced a collaboration with global sports apparel, PUMA. The collaboration includes an exclusive co-branded EVOS Esports PUMA tracksuit and the first-ever unique activation by bundling b…
